comment: The phone number that came with my new phone also came with 2 robo calls with voicemails every day.  Altho i spoke with the co. And explained that the person they were trying to reach was no longer at this number - the calls continued.   After six months of clearing these calls every day i am deeply grateful for this solution.  Since i can't give you 6 stars, here are 5.
title: Really do love this

author: Melanie Taylor
comment: I downloaded this app because I needed to block a number from calling my phone and being able to leave a voicemail. I checked out this app and saw so many great reviews. After downloading the app I saw awesome features but when I officically used the app and set the app the to not allow a certain number to call and leave  a voicemail, it would block the call but the caller could still leave a voicemail. Is there something I'm doing wrong when setting it up?
title: Need help using the app

author: brandon day
comment: Didn't work. Android version 5.1.1. Almost all recent reviews say it doesn't work. They must have broken it during an update them abandoned the project and everyone who downloaded it. Someone said they reached out to the dev with no reply. This app is useless. Nice design tho

author: Mark Mendoza
comment: Does not work as advertised.  The number I have blocked still comes through about 3 times a day, however it says that in the "block log" that it has been blocked. Not sure what the problem is with this app as I do NOT have any other call blocker on my phone.

author: Colleen Hogan
comment: Had a drunk family member CONSTANTLY calling up to and beyond 20 x a day and leaving absolutely terrible voicemails. She would only call to scream and insult me. I feel so free now!
title: Works very well

author: Don Carlow
comment: Blocks the calls and does not send them to voicemail! I've been trying to block this particular twice a day spam caller for weeks. All the other apps just sent the call to voicemail. So I had to call voicemail everyday day to delete the messages. This app blocks the call and does not send it to voicemail!! Works perfectly!
title: Best blocking app ever!

comment: This app advertises that it blocks vm from unwanted numbers. That's why I got it. But guess what, it does not work.  Also I contacted their support people twice to make sure it wasn't my settings but no reply! Dont waste ur time on this app.

author: Kimberly bell
comment: This is the only app that doesn't allow calls or voicemails to come through once they are blacklisted. So no more calls from pain-in-the-ass sales people or any other people I don't want to talk to. They all get hung up on!
title: Fantastic app! It does what it says!

comment: After trying a dozen call blockers, I finally found one where the "pick up, hang up" feature actually works! The phone numbers on my Blacklist automatically get disconnected and can't even leave a voicemail! Love this app!       : )
title: THE BEST!

author: Michele R
comment: It works and keeps calls and voice messages from getting through.  However you are only allowed to have 5 numbers on the block list and I had several calls that were on the block were able to leave a voice message for someone else.  But it's a good app to use.
title: Great app

author: James Williams
comment: I have some old man (wrong #) that calls me 20+ times a day even after I talked to him 3 different times politely asking him to stop. This app saved me and the old guy from no longer being polite
title: Works awesome

author: rick c
comment: Fcc  report does not block but allows calls thru to vm. Bottom line is that app is no good. Try another.  Update: when numbers ate on block list, app still let's them thru.
I finally am able to block private numbers, and spam. I had a question, sent an email,  and they got back to me right away. How awesome for a free app! Highly recommend
title: This app fixes my phone!

author: Kiya O
comment: I love this app exactly what I've been looking for it works wonderful I  for sure recommend it.   It does exactly what is says no more unwanted phone calls and you can choose if they leave a voicemail or not.  It's so worth it

author: W Rahim
comment: Doesnt hang up calls as advertised , just sends to voicemail.  Emailed dev twice , but they dont answer emails. Seem as useless as their app. Dont buy and dont use.

author: Eric Stratton
comment: Great app... the only negative is you can only block 5 numbers for free. It costs $1.00 for unlimited. But it's still worth a dollar. As of this post... I've already blocked 66 BS numbers from scam artists and solicitors. I recommend it highly.

author: Spongar 51
comment: I wanted to see if it worked and it didn't after I added the numbers. I uninstalled it and now my entire history on my phone of that number disappeared and I needed that evidence for court. I'm pissed off

author: Laura H
comment: I recently had somebody stalking and harassing me from the internet. This app enabled me to block their calls and hang up on them instead of allowing them to record messages to me. Thank you!
title: Just what I needed

author: Trimica Gartrell
comment: When I first tried the app it worked just fine. However,  as time went on, it would glitch and not block the call  and eventually  it stopped blocking the voice mail which is the main reason  I downloaded  the app in the first place. Now it's  forcing  me to pay for the app to do what it was already doing.  I guess the makers felt like they should  be getting  some money out the deal. Smh

reply.author: GreyThinker
reply.content: Read the instructions or email us at support@a0softus.com, we'll show you how to fix it.

title: Glitches and then stopped working properly all together

comment: Buyer beware! Does not perform as advertised. Actually does not perform at all. I purchased this app so it would block numbers and not allow any of them to leave voicemail. The blocked calls still ring through and can leave voicemails. I have reached out to support twice and have not received any response to my emails. I really needed this service however there is no point in me continuing the service since it does not work. The fact that the support group has not reached out to me & that there is no customer service telephone number for them does not give me any other choice than to discontinue service.

author: Ingram
comment: Like this one best. Free version allows block 5 numbers. For only $1 more upgrade for more. Easy to use. Like better than extreme version cause less complicated
title: Send call direct to VM or hangup

author: AliMali
comment: Only sends calls to voicemail. It worked at first but now its broken even though I didn't change any settings and my app settings say to pickup/hangup with no voicemail. And I have the galaxy s7 so according to them it should work. I've tried emailing the developers twice but I just keep getting an outdated automated reply with no response. I'm glad I waited to test the app before buying the paid version. Uninstalled.

author: Jiselle Batiz
comment: no app blocked the person completely, since I didn't want voicemails left and this app did it. at first I installed it and it wouldn't block the voicemails, so I uninstalled it because I checked that no other blocking app was installed and my phone was not blocking the number. suddenly i thought that from the previous blocking apps which I deleted, there were cookies and data from those apps left in my phone. so I cleaned the cashed data from my phone under Storage, restarted my phone and WOALA! it worked!!
title: my search is over!!! please read!!!

comment: Used to be pestered with nuisance calls, not anymore. This is the best blocker I've had. To quote the old saying ' it's the best thing since sliced bread. Trev Smith

author: Eric Sanders
comment: I read the reviews and I see a few people having minor issues with this app.. When using this app it gives you an "Action" option after you type in a number, you'll have to click on: no call - no voicemail. Then you'll never even hear a ring. :-)     Besides the fact that a person can still text, I grateful for this app.
title: I'm Satisfied

author: Veronica Taylor
comment: FINALLY an app that gives you the option to block a call without the call going to voicemail!  It just pick up and hang up on the block callers without you even knowing unless you pick the option to  notify you of a block caller. But who wants to be notified thats the purpose of blocking their ass!! I absolutely love it, Im gonna go blocking crazy 📵📵
title: 5star

author: Ge Ge
comment: Sometimes callers on the blocked list don't get hung up on as they're supposed to. The calls still go to vm.
title: Seems inconsistent

author: Catrina
comment: I selected the hang up no voicemail option but it still let's the blocked caller leave a voicemail. All it did was forward them directly to my voicemail.

author: Sherri Jelinek
comment: I purchased this app last year and loved it. But now all of a sudden it stopped working. As others on here as well, the blocked calls still come through. I too, have sent an email to the developers, only for them to not respond.

author: Mr Charles
comment: Thank you for making such a great app.  The hang up feature works!! I have no idea why the other call block apps stopped supporting this function, but that and all the other features works. To the developers - thank you!!! Great job!!
title: Perfect! !!

author: Robert T Jones
comment: Have to give a 5 as I haven't had a bogus call or voicemail since installing this app.  I was getting 5 spam calls a day and my voicemail filled up with spam calls every 2 days.  Happy camper here. Update If calls go directly to voicemail, try turning off WiFi when not using it. Worked for me.

author: Gena M
comment: SCAM APP!!  I've tried to email them FOUR TIMES NOW.... The app only worked twicw... I need it to work more than that. Can someone please contact me?? Why do you have an email if you don't answer them?

author: Jasmine Guillory
comment: Best damn app ever.  I have over 70 numbers stored under contact name "A Damn Telemarketer".   I don't see their calls, missed calls, or get their voiemails....genius.

author: Chris Rogers
comment: Doesn't work at all. Didn't block number nor did it block voicemail...Don't waste your time use another call blocker
title: Complete trash

author: Brandi Vaughan
comment: Best app ever! Spam callers are now being blocked AND cannot leave a voicemail. Finally, my voicemail notification bell isn't going off 3 to 4 times a day as a result of spammer messages.   The app also extracts blocked numbers from your phone's call log, so you can't even see if they called, unless you check the app's blocked call log. What a relief! A huge thank you to whomever built this app!

author: Robert Johnson
comment: I had pestering student loan call saying I might be able to not have to pay anything like 6 or more times a day. They would  get by all other blockers by leaving a message. This app eliminated that, thanks...
title: Best app yet

comment: Works well so far. It's the ONLY available option in app store for HANGING UP on unwanted calls before they reach voicemail since Lollipop. So I can't compare it to other apps because they're not allowed by Android/Google Play store to hangup on calls. Not sure why, other than monopoly = $$. The pop-ups can be confusing or take up too much screen, so I just disabled them. Glad to have that option. So far, so good tho.
title: Does the Job.

author: Tam C
comment: I have tried at least a total of six blockers and none of them can seem to block ONE particular number that keeps getting thru. I block it but 9 times a day I get a voicemail from them, I have requested several times to get them to quit but they dont. Even though I block it the get through to the voicemail and the call log doesn't show the number, and yes it's the right one. Why does it block all the rest with the exception of just one?
title: Wishing an app would work

author: Littlest Toucan
comment: On 2 occasions app answered the calls, but didn't hangup.  I heard the caller speaking, the phone didn't ring, just answered the call.  This is a Republic Wireless phone, their tech help, helped me pinpoint this anomaly to your app.  Hope this gets corrected.
title: Good Idea, But Fails.

author: Kaila Micklevitz
comment: Had an annoying telemarketer that kept calling and leaving voicemails, I downloaded this app and the hang up no voicemail app is a lifesaver!!
title: Works Great!
